books.author: Truman Capote
books.description: A true crime novel by Truman Capote, focusing on the murder of the Clutter family in Holcomb, Kansas.
books.title: In Cold Blood

books.author: Michelle McNamara
books.description: A true crime book by Michelle McNamara, investigating the Golden State Killer, a serial killer and rapist.
books.title: I'll Be Gone in the Dark

books.author: Ann Rule
books.description: A true crime book by Ann Rule, exploring the case of Ted Bundy, an American serial killer.
books.title: The Stranger Beside Me

books.author: Robert Graysmith
books.description: A true crime book by Robert Graysmith, investigating the Zodiac Killer, an unidentified serial killer.
books.title: Zodiac

books.author: Erik Larson
books.description: A true crime book by Erik Larson, recounting the 1893 World's Fair in Chicago and the serial killer H. H. Holmes.
books.title: The Devil in the White City

books.author: Mara Leveritt
books.description: A true crime book by Mara Leveritt, investigating the wrongful conviction of three teenagers in Arkansas.
books.title: Devil's Knot

books.author: John E. Douglas
books.description: A true crime book by John E. Douglas, a former FBI agent, exploring various criminal cases.
books.title: Mindhunter

books.author: Robert Kolker
books.description: A true crime book by Robert Kolker, investigating the case of the Long Island serial killer.
books.title: Lost Girls

books.author: Joe McGinniss
books.description: A true crime book by Joe McGinniss, examining the murder case of Jeffrey MacDonald, a former U.S. Army officer.
books.title: Fatal Vision

books.author: John Douglas & Mark Olshaker
books.description: A true crime book by Mindhunter, focusing on the FBI's criminal profiling unit.
books.title: The Anatomy of Motive

books.author: Alan Moore & Eddie Campbell
books.description: Five unsolved murders. A hundred years of mystery. One sprawling conspiracy, one metropolis on the brink of the twentieth century, one bloody-minded Ripper ushering London into the modern age of terror, and one comics masterpiece
books.title: From Hell

books.author: Ann Rule
books.description: A true crime book by Ann Rule, exploring the case of Ted Bundy, an American serial killer.
books.title: The Stranger Beside Me

books.author: Ryan Green
books.description: Man-Eater is a dramatic and gripping account of the first women in Australia to be given a life sentence without parole and a special addendum ‘never to be released’.
books.title: Man Eater

books.author: Philip Carlo
books.description: The Night Stalker, based on years of meticulous research and extensive interviews with Ramirez, revealed the killer and his horrifying crimes to be even more chilling than anyone could have imagined.
books.title: The Night Stalker

books.author: Sue Black
books.description: Cutting through hype, romanticism, and cliché, she recounts her first dissection; her own first acquaintance with a loved one’s death; the mortal remains in her lab and at burial sites as well as scenes of violence, murder, and criminal dismemberment.
books.title: All That Remains

books.author: Gregg Olsen
books.description: Harrowing and heartrending, If You Tell is a survivor’s story of absolute evil―and the freedom and justice that Nikki, Sami, and Tori risked their lives to fight for.
books.title: If You Tell

books.author: Ethan Brown
books.description: A true crime book by Ethan Brown, investigating the case of the unsolved murders of young women in a small Louisiana town.
books.title: Murder in the Bayou

books.author: Peter O'Mahoney
books.description: In Charleston, South Carolina, eighteen-year-old Alicia Fenton is arrested for the murder of her stepfather. In exchange for information that has been buried for twenty years, attorney Joe Hennessy joins her defense team.
books.title: The Southern Killer

books.author: Mindy Mejia
books.description: A true crime book by Mindy Mejia, delving into the disappearance of two young women in a remote Minnesota town.
books.title: Everything You Want Me to Be

books.author: Casey Cep
books.description: A true crime book by Casey Cep, exploring the investigation into a series of mysterious murders in rural Alabama.
books.title: Furious Hours
